text: (avan yūsuphinṟe aṭutt cenn paṟaññu:) hē, satyasandhanāya yūsuph‌, taṭicc keāḻutta ēḻ paśukkaḷe ēḻ meliñña paśukkaḷ tinnunna kāryattiluṁ ēḻ paccakkatirukaḷuṭeyuṁ vēṟe ēḻ uṇaṅṅiya katirukaḷuṭeyuṁ kāryattiluṁ tāṅkaḷ ñaṅṅaḷkku vidhi paṟaññutaraṇaṁ. janaṅṅaḷ aṟiyuvānāyi ā vivaravuṁ keāṇṭ enikk avaruṭe aṭuttēkk maṭaṅṅāmallēā
